attributes.action: guarantee that Londoners' council tax will not be increased further to fund the shortfall in Olympic funding.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many Londoners object to being the only ones who are paying additional council tax to fund the Olympics when people from further afield will benefit from the games - even if only the opportunity to attend events. We do not trust Livingstone's assurances that tax will not be increased so we need to hear it from the top.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
